alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; South Central Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 02 at 2:03AM PDT until April 03 at 6:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Snow amounts up to 6 inches near mountain bases. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County, Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County, Southwest Elko County and South Central Elko County. * WHEN...From 5 PM Sunday to 6 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; South Central Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County
